value.latex:
Soit $f:[1,\infty [\rightarrow {\Rr}^{+} $ continue telle que
$$\int_{1}^{\infty }f(t)dt $$ converge.
Montrer que
$$\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow \infty }\frac{1}{x}\int_{1}^{x}tf(t)dt=0. $$
value.html: Soit \(f:[1,\infty [\rightarrow {\Rr}^{+}\) continue telle que \[\int_{1}^{\infty }f(t)dt\] converge. Montrer que \[\lim\limits_{x\rightarrow \infty }\frac{1}{x}\int_{1}^{x}tf(t)dt=0.\]
